{{infobox character | people=[[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] | name=Núneth | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Andustar]], [[Númenor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Sindarin]] | birth=Before {{SA|771}} | birthlocation=Númenor | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Beregar]] | children=[[Erendis]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Núneth''' was the wife of [[Beregar]] and the mother of [[Erendis]], who unhappily married [[Tar-Aldarion]]. Núneth and her family lived in the western part of Númenor before Erendis left to join the household of Queen [[Almarian]]. Despite knowing her daughter's headstrong nature, Núneth urged her to marry the prince and gave her advice over the years. When Erendis dismissed the Elven-birds that had dwelt in her garden in [[Armenelos]] they flew to her parents' house and Núneth correctly divined that it was a sign that Aldarion had left his wife.{{UT|Wife}} ==Etymology== ''Núneth'' is [[Sindarin]] and means "Woman of the West" (from ''[[annûn]]'', 'West', and ''[[-eth]]'', a feminine suffix). ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | BEO | | | | |BEO=[[House of Bëor|''House
